name: Sanderson Farms, Inc.
description: Sanderson Farms, Inc. is one of the largest poultry producers in the United States, specializing in the production, processing, and marketing of fresh and frozen chicken products. Founded in 1947, Sanderson Farms operates a vertically integrated business model, which allows the company to maintain control over every aspect of its operations, from breeding and hatching to processing and distribution. The company is committed to providing high-quality chicken products to its customers while adhering to stringent animal welfare and food safety standards. Sanderson Farms markets its products under the 'Sanderson Farms' brand and supplies retailers, foodservice operators, and further processors across the nation. With a focus on sustainability, Sanderson Farms continually invests in innovative practices to minimize its environmental impact and enhance operational efficiency. The company's dedication to quality and integrity has earned it a strong reputation in the poultry industry, making it a trusted choice for consumers and businesses alike. Sanderson Farms is headquartered in Laurel, Mississippi, and operates multiple processing plants and feed mills throughout the southeastern United States.

seo.meta_title: Sanderson Farms, Inc. | Leading Poultry Producer
seo.meta_description: Explore Sanderson Farms, one of the largest poultry producers in the U.S., committed to quality chicken products and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Sanderson Farms produce?
faq.answer: Sanderson Farms primarily produces fresh and frozen chicken products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sanderson Farms?
faq.answer: Joe F. Sanderson Jr. is the CEO of Sanderson Farms, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Sanderson Farms headquartered?
faq.answer: Sanderson Farms is headquartered in Laurel, Mississippi, USA.

faq.question: What are Sanderson Farms' main products?
faq.answer: Sanderson Farms' main products include whole chickens, chicken breast, thighs, wings, and fully cooked chicken products.
